          <title>
            <string language="es">Acción geológica de las aguas marinas</string>
            <string language="en">The geological action of sea water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die geologische Tätigkeit des Meereswassers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'action géologique de l'eau de mer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A ação geological da água de mar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'azione geologica dell'acqua di mare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η γεωλογική ενέργεια του θαλάσσιου νερού</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Explica la acción geológica del mar, analizando la acción erosiva, el trasporte y la sedimentación.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining the geological action of the sea, analysing erosion, transport and sedimentation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">aguas marinas</string>
            <string language="en">sea water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geología</string>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, welches die geologische Tätigkeit des 
Meeres, des Analysierens von von Abnutzung, des Transportes und der 
Sedimentbildung erklärt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet expliquant l'action géologique de la mer, 
d'analyser l'érosion, du transport et de la sédimentation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que explica a ação geological do mar, de
analisar a erosão, de transporte e de sedimentation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che spiega l'azione geologica del mare, 
analizzare dell'erosione, di trasporto e della sedimentazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξηγεί τη γεωλογική ενέργεια της θάλασσας, 
που αναλύει τη διάβρωση, τη μεταφορά και την ιζηματογένεση.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meereswasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
